name: Coursera
desc: Coursera is an online learning platform that offers massive open online courses, specializations, and degrees. Coursera works with universities and other organizations to offer online courses, specializations, and degrees in a variety of subjects, such as engineering, humanities, medicine, biology, social sciences, mathematics, business, computer science, digital marketing, data science, and others.

name: Nestle
desc: Nesternship is an internship program for final year and recent graduates. The programme is designed to give students the opportunity to gain real-world experience at one of the world's leading companies in the food and beverage sector. The program will give students access to real-world projects, be trained by leading industry experts and have the opportunity to get a formal employment contract at Nestl√©.

name: Google Digital 4.0
desc: This is a free course shared by experts from Google and its partners. initiated by Google, in conjunction with VCCI-HCMC, VWU, VWEC and many other partners across the country, to provide free training on digital skills, soft skills, and business skills from basic to advanced. The goal of the program is to provide free platforms and tools to help all those who want to start a business update digital knowledge, enhance management ability to help develop businesses, increase online business efficiency and create many new job opportunities for society.
